message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its potential, I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000? It's a fair offer considering the value this product will bring you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,800?
